title: Arthur C. Clarke. RIP.
description: A personal farewell to one of my favourite authors

children.value: This has nothing whatsoever to do with Linux or any other subject matter of this blog, but I want to mention it anyway.

Earlier this week, we saw the passing of Arthur C. Clarke, author of many sci-fi greats, including among many better known titles, the Rama series. These books were a huge part of my childhood, and gave me much enjoyment. Here's yet another copy of the his 90th birthday reflections, a great little piece of film:
